Japanese: さあ、デイン。⏎旅は まもなく終わる⏸おまえが命をかけて⏎あつめた宝石……⏸まずさいしょに父親に⏎見せてやるんだ
Google Translate: Come on, Dane. ⏎Her journey will end soon⏸You risked your life⏎to collect the jewels...⏸First of all, you should show it to your father⏎

Japanese: さあ、デイン。⏎ジャードが待っているぞ!
Google Translate: Come on, Dane. ⏎Jard is waiting!

Japanese: デインのお父様に⏎気に入ってもらえるかしら?
Google Translate: Will Dain's father like it?

Japanese: きみなら まちがいないよ、ジャスミン
Google Translate: You're right, Jasmine.

Japanese: (ナ、ナンテ……マボロシダ……)
Google Translate: (Na, Nante... Maboroshida...)

Japanese: 父さん、母さん!⏎宝石は全部そろったよ!⏸ぼく、やったよ!
Google Translate: Dad, Mom!⏎All the jewels are here!⏸I did it!

Japanese: よくやった、息子よ!
Google Translate: Well done, son!

Japanese: わたしたちはゆめを見たのよ⏸息子がデインじゃなくて⏎リーフとかいう……⏸そう、たよりない子が⏎息子のゆめよ
Google Translate: We saw a dream ⏸ My son wasn't Dain ⏎ His name was Leaf... ⏸ That's right, there was a hopeless child ⏎ My son's dream

Japanese: もう、そんなゆめの事なんか⏎忘れてしまおう!
Google Translate: Let's forget about that dream!

Japanese: これは手強そうだ
Google Translate: This looks tough

Japanese: そこのきみ!⏸ぼさーっと見てないで⏎力を貸してくれないか!?
Google Translate: You there! ⏸ Don't stare at me ⏎ Can you lend me your strength!?

Japanese: あの子、おびえているわ。⏎まきこんじゃかわいそうよ……
Google Translate: That kid is scared. ⏎I feel sorry for Makiko...

Japanese: きみ、あぶないから⏎家の中に入って かくれていなさい
Google Translate: You are in danger ⏎Go inside the house and hide.

Japanese: そうよ、うちのデインは強いんだから⏎まかせていればいいのよ
Google Translate: That's right, my Dain is strong, so you can leave it to him.

Japanese: なんてまぼろしを見せるんだ!
Google Translate: What an illusion!

Japanese: ほほう……打ちかったとな⏸では、次はおまえ。⏎ジャスミンとか言ったな
Google Translate: Hoho...I guess I hit it⏸ Well then, you're next. ⏎You said jasmine.

Japanese: だいじょうぶだよ、ジャスミン。⏎心を強く持って!
Google Translate: It's okay, Jasmine. ⏎Be strong in your heart!

Japanese: ふふふ……⏎おまえにふさわしいのは……
Google Translate: Hehehe...⏎What is suitable for you is...

Japanese: 何か書いてある……⏸『#f8ff真っ黒石#fcff』を3こささげよ……
Google Translate: There's something written on it... ⏸ Make 3 pieces of "#f8ff pitch black stone #fcff"...

Japanese: かんたんじゃない!
Google Translate: It's not easy!

Japanese: 『#f8ff真っ黒石#fcff』を3つ集めてきたわ。⏎ここに置くわよ
Google Translate: I've collected three ``#f8ff pitch black stones #fcff''. ⏎I'll put it here.

Japanese: ふん⏸『#f8ffまぼろしの首かざり#fcff』を見つけてきたら⏎ここを とおしてやるぞ!
Google Translate: Hmm⏸If you find “#f8ff imaginary neck ornament #fcff”⏎I’ll send it through here!

Japanese: 『#f8ffまぼろしの首かざり#fcff』ね?⏎わかったわ
Google Translate: 『#f8ff Illusionary neck ornament#fcff』 right?⏎I understand.

Japanese: みごとだ……⏎とおるがよい
Google Translate: It's amazing...⏎Toru is good

Japanese: 何か書いてある……⏸うごくな。心をしずめよ……
Google Translate: There's something written...⏸It's moving. Calm your heart...

Japanese: あっ! とびらが!?
Google Translate: Ah! The door!?

Japanese: やっぱり! 思ったとおりだわ!
Google Translate: As expected! It's just as I thought!

Japanese: わたしのかちね!
Google Translate: My home!

Japanese: あとはバルダ……
Google Translate: And then there's Barda...

Japanese: まかせておけ!
Google Translate: Leave it to me!

Japanese: ふふふ……⏎おまえはどうかな?
Google Translate: Hehehe...⏎What about you?

Japanese: これがゲーム?⏎オレをバカにするな!
Google Translate: Is this a game?⏎Don't make fun of me!

Japanese: うぬぼれるなよ!
Google Translate: Don't be conceited!

Japanese: ふん……読めたぞ
Google Translate: Hmm...I read it.

Japanese: リーフ! ジャスミン!⏎オレはやったぞ!
Google Translate: Leaf! Jasmine!⏎I did it!

Japanese: さあ、番人よ⏸オレたちはゲームを⏎やりとげた!
Google Translate: Well, keepers, we've played the game!

Japanese: 宝石を わたしてもらおう。⏎それがルールなんだろう?
Google Translate: Let me give you the jewels. ⏎Isn't that the rule?

Japanese: い、いや、ダメだ⏸この宝石はわしの宝だ!⏎これが無くなったら わしは……
Google Translate: No, no, no ⏸ This gem is my treasure! ⏎ If this disappears, I...

Japanese: ダイアモンドは不正をきらう⏸素直にわたさないと⏎ダイアモンドのまりょくが……
Google Translate: Diamonds hate injustice⏸If you don't hand it over honestly⏎Diamond Marryoku...

Japanese: ぐわっ!!
Google Translate: Gwaa!!

Japanese: どうしたの!?
Google Translate: what happened!?

Japanese: ダイアモンドの力か!?
Google Translate: Is it the power of diamonds?

Japanese: うん!
Google Translate: Yeah!

Japanese: やった!
Google Translate: Yay!

Japanese: #f9ff父さん。⏎#f9ffぼくたちはついにやりました。⏎#f9ff7つのベルトの穴が⏎#f9ff全部埋まりました!
Google Translate: #f9ffDad. ⏎#f9ffWe finally did it. ⏎#f9ffAll seven belt holes ⏎#f9ff are filled!

Japanese: リーフ……ジャスミン……
Google Translate: Leaf...Jasmine...

Japanese: これでベルトは完成ね
Google Translate: The belt is now complete.

Japanese: うわっ!?
Google Translate: Wow!?

Japanese: これは!?
Google Translate: this is!?

Japanese: わたしはトーラ族の⏎ゼアンと申します⏸あなたたちには なんと⏎おれいを言えば良いのか……
Google Translate: My name is Zean from the Torah tribe, and I don't know what to say to you...

Japanese: ゼアンよ⏸トーラの民は ちかいをやぶった。⏎その結果が……これだったのか?
Google Translate: Zean, the people of Torah have defeated the enemy. ⏎The result...was this?

Japanese: はい、はずかしながらそのとおり⏸トーラが栄えたのは⏎まりょくのおかげでした⏸それなのに わたしたちは……⏸そう、自分たちがかんぺきなのだと⏎考えたのです⏸ですから、エンドン王から⏎助けをもとめる手紙が来たとき……⏸わたしたちは 大むかしのちかいなど⏎見向きもしなかったのです⏸しかし、ちかいは 生きていました
Google Translate: Yes, that's right, although I'm embarrassed to say that Thora flourished because of Marryoku.And yet, we thought...that we were perfect.Therefore, from King Endon... ⏎When a letter came asking for help... ⏸We didn't pay any attention to the ``long-ago near'' ⏎But the near was alive.

Japanese: エンドン国王は どうなったの?
Google Translate: What happened to King Endon?

Japanese: ざんねんながら わたしたちは⏎何も知らないのです……
Google Translate: At first glance, we don't know anything...

Japanese: おかげで⏎目がさめました……
Google Translate: Thanks to you, I woke up...

Japanese: あなたは エンドン国王では⏎ないのですね?
Google Translate: You're not King Endon, are you?

Japanese: はい。ちがいます⏸わしは リスメアという 町で⏎宿屋を営んでいました
Google Translate: yes. No, I used to run an inn in a town called Lysmere.

Japanese: 宿屋チャンピオンか!?
Google Translate: Inn Champion!?

Japanese: ご存知でしたか。⏎わしはあそこのていしゅでした⏸ところがとつぜん影の憲兵団に⏎宿がおそわれて……⏸わしは 命からがら⏎この地まで にげてきたのです⏸そして 怒りと ぜつぼうの中で⏎くらしていました
Google Translate: Did you know? ⏎I was living there, but suddenly the inn was attacked by a group of military police in the shadows... ⏎I barely escaped with my life. I was living in

Japanese: そこを影の大王に⏎つけこまれたんですね?
Google Translate: The Great Shadow King took advantage of that, right?

Japanese: はい……
Google Translate: yes……

Japanese: しかし、なぜエンドン国王を⏎名乗ったのだ?
Google Translate: But why did he call himself King Endon?

Japanese: 影の大王の命令です。⏎わしのすがたを見、言葉を聞けば……
Google Translate: This is the order of the Great Shadow King. ⏎If you look at me and hear my words...

Japanese: そうか!⏸だれも国王のために戦おうなんて⏎思わなくなる!
Google Translate: That's right!⏸No one will want to fight for the king!

Japanese: そうです⏸かつて、ひとりだけゲームに⏎しょうりした方がいました⏸その方は宝石を受け取ろうと⏎せず……⏸ただ、国王には失望したと⏎言いのこして この地を去りました…
Google Translate: That's right⏸Once upon a time, there was only one person who played the game⏎and did not accept the jewels...⏸However, he left this place saying that he was disappointed in the king...

Japanese: それは、だれだ!?
Google Translate: Who is that!?

Japanese: たしか……ジョーカーという⏎名の男だったかと
Google Translate: I think it was a man named Joker...

Japanese: だからジョーカーは……
Google Translate: So Joker...

Japanese: 国王を悪く言うのだな
Google Translate: You say bad things about the king.

Japanese: 本当にもうしわけない事を⏎しました……
Google Translate: I did something I really shouldn't have done...

Japanese: リーフ、ご苦労さま
Google Translate: Leaf, thank you for your hard work.

Japanese: きみと バルダのおかげだよ
Google Translate: It's all thanks to you and Barda.

Japanese: いろいろ、ひどい事言って⏎ごめんね
Google Translate: I'm sorry for saying all sorts of terrible things.

Japanese: そんなに言われたかな?
Google Translate: Did you say that much?

Japanese: なーんだ。⏎もっと、いじわるすれば良かったわ
Google Translate: What? ⏎I should have messed with you more.

Japanese: ぼくは いじわるされていたの!?
Google Translate: Was I being bullied?

Japanese: ジャスミン、リーフをからかうな
Google Translate: Jasmine, don't make fun of Leaf.

Japanese: そうね。⏎からかうならやっぱりバルダね
Google Translate: That's right. ⏎If you're going to make fun of me, it's definitely Barda.

Japanese: おい!
Google Translate: Hey!

Japanese: ねえ、リーフ⏸もう一度ベルトを見せて
Google Translate: Hey, Leaf⏸Show me your belt again.

Japanese: ダメだ。⏎周囲の目がある
Google Translate: No. ⏎There are eyes around you

Japanese: ……いや、やはり、オレも見たい
Google Translate: ...No, I still want to see it too.

Japanese: ほら!
Google Translate: Look!

Japanese: ……ふはは
Google Translate: ...Hahaha

Japanese: あはははは!
Google Translate: Ahahahaha!

Japanese: わはははは!
Google Translate: Wahahahaha!

Japanese: はははははは! やったー!
Google Translate: Hahahahaha! Yay!

Japanese: 父さん。⏎こんなに笑ったのは久しぶりです。⏎⏎まだ、デルトラ王家のあとつぎを⏎さがさなくてはならないけど⏎あまり心配していません。
Google Translate: Dad. ⏎It's been a while since I laughed this much. ⏎⏎I still have to ⏎find a successor to the Deltora royal family, but ⏎I'm not too worried.

Japanese: ぼくたちには道しるべがあります。⏎⏎このデルトラのベルトが⏎ぼくたちをみちびいてくれる。⏎そんな気がしています。
Google Translate: We have a guidepost. ⏎⏎This Deltora belt will guide us. ⏎That's how I feel.

Japanese: 助けてくれて、ありがとう!⏎うふふ……思わず笑顔になっちゃう!
Google Translate: Thank you for helping me!⏎Hehehe...I can't help but smile!

Japanese: 王とのちかいをやぶってしまった事が⏎はずかしいわ。約束は守らなくっちゃ!
Google Translate: I'm embarrassed that I broke my promise to the king. I have to keep my promise!

Japanese: 地に足をつけて步けるの!⏎これって、とっても大切な事よ!
Google Translate: You can walk with your feet on the ground!⏎This is very important!

Japanese: 谷をさまよってる間、生きた心地が⏎しなかったわ。本当にありがとう!
Google Translate: While wandering through the valley, I didn't feel alive. thanks so much!

Japanese: ありがとう……⏸あなた方には してもしきれないほど⏎かんしゃしています
Google Translate: Thank you...⏸I'm more than grateful to you⏎

Japanese: ううう……⏎わたしは……いったい……?
Google Translate: Uuuuu...⏎What am I...?

Japanese: これからは、つみをつぐなうため⏎人のためにはたらこうと思います……
Google Translate: From now on, I will work for others to atone for my sins...

Japanese: よしよし。むずかしい話は⏎リーフとバルダにまかせようね クリー
Google Translate: Okay, okay. Let's leave the difficult questions to Leaf and Barda, Cree.

Japanese: また この町で くらせるのは⏎あなたたちの おかげです⏸本当に ありがとうございます
Google Translate: It is thanks to you that I can live in this town again⏸Thank you very much.

Japanese: われわれの 思い上がりが 王と⏎世界を苦しめたのだ……⏸つみほろぼしの方法を⏎考えねば……
Google Translate: Our hubris has caused the king and the world to suffer... We need to think of a way to break the knot...

Japanese: また、家族で いっしょに⏎すごせるなんて ゆめのようです!
Google Translate: Also, it feels like a dream to be able to spend time together as a family!

Japanese: ありがとう!⏎本当にありがとう!
Google Translate: Thank you! ⏎Thank you so much!

Japanese: わたし、おとうとがほしいよ!
Google Translate: I want a father!

Japanese: この町で なやみながら⏎生きてきました……⏸でも、あの谷で もうじゃとして⏎さまようより ずっと マシです!
Google Translate: I've been living a lazy life in this town... But it's much better than wandering around in that valley!

Japanese: トーラは 生まれ変わります⏸日々のしあわせへの かんしゃを⏎忘れない町に
Google Translate: Tora will be reborn ⏸ Confidence for daily happiness ⏎ A town that will never forget

Japanese: 人生これからっす!⏎がんばるっす!
Google Translate: Life is about to begin! ⏎I'll do my best!

Japanese: リーフさん、ありがとうございます。⏎あなたの事は 一生忘れません
Google Translate: Thank you, Leaf. ⏎I will never forget you

Japanese: トーラは もう 2度と⏎ちかいを やぶったりはしません!
Google Translate: Thora will never err on the side of ⏎ again!
